title: DSE失敗唔緊要 外國CC洗底入番UCLA 你問我答

replies.msg:
小弟為男拔運動狗 當年DSE個分夠做牙蘇仔 第二年去外國cc 講真做埋part time
CC啲野訓喺度都A到 CC transfer 前gpa係3.91 B左科stat transfer左之後gpa會重計 sophomore 入左UCLA Anderson

啲人係好勁 但真係多大陸人 同埋ucla開始差聽啲師兄講 不過有些少條件比你去外國讀 一定要出去讀 因為出到外面世界咸魚都可以返生

美國商科有兩種
一係IVY 一係垃圾

replies.msg:
sophomore transfer 入去UCLA?

https://www.admission.ucla.edu/FAQ/TR_Before.htm

A: Transfer students must be at junior-level standing (60-86 semester units/90-129 quarter units) by the end of the spring term prior to the fall that they are applying for. Keep in mind that the units used to determine junior-level standing have to be transferable.
dse失敗唔緊要 屋企疊水就夠 你問我答
